gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 120, Lakers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings win their second straight game as they defeated the Lakers, 120-107. Harrison Barnes led five Kings in double-figures with 23 points as DeAaron Fox (21 points, seven assists) and Domantas Sabonis (17 points, 19 rebounds, 10 assists) totaled 38 points. Austin Reaves led the Lakers with 28 points (7-12 3PT), six rebounds, and 4 assists as Anthony Davis (22 points, 10 rebounds) and LeBron James (18 points, 13 rebounds, nine assists) added 40 points. The Kings improve to 38-27 and takeover the 6th seed from Phoenix as the Lakers move to 36-31.
